name: Uj3bać Menela!
description:
The game tells the story of Pawełek and his boyfriend Patryk. His boyfriend told him secrets about a hobo camping on a desert island. Will Pawełek get the beer for him and his boyfriend?

The game offers: 

  • High level graphics. 
  • Decent humor. 
  • Great and exaggerated opponents. 
  • Pleasant gameplay.

(Game only in Polish language but other languages will be added soon)
